attributes.name: role
attributes.description: The role attribute is required and should be set to banner.

attributes.name: aria-hidden
attributes.description: The aria-hidden attribute is optional. It tells if the banner is visible or not. The value should be set to either false or true.

classes.name: zui-banner
classes.description: The zui-banner class identifies an HTML element as a banner.

classes.name: zui-banner-danger
classes.description: The zui-banner-danger class should be set on the same element that has the zui-banner class set. By setting the zui-banner-danger class you identity the banner as a dangerous message.

classes.name: zui-banner-success
classes.description: The zui-banner-success class should be set on the same element that has the zui-banner class set. By setting the zui-banner-success class you identity the banner as a successful message.

classes.name: zui-banner-warning
classes.description: The zui-banner-warning class should be set on the same element that has the zui-banner class set. By setting the zui-banner-warning class you identity the banner as a warning.
